body: Should I complete https://github.com/hyperledger/aries-vcx/pull/1224 given what you've done here? :man_shrugging:
Might be nice to see a test for this--but it's definitely not a deal breaker. Cool to see the addition here!
ye possibly. your fix takes it a little further with the ability to pass in a key. but maybe that could be a feature for another time. the core of the issue should be fixed
